title: Fruitinator.org
text: A responsive e-commerce frontend for exotic fruit shopping on desktop and mobile

title: Fullstacklab.net
text: A single-page application with responsive design that highlights professional work and services

title: Monomind.info
text: A monophonic synthesizer to play and record synth bass lines from the 80s

title: Taskify
text: A project management tool to administer and keep track of ongoing tasks

title: FREM
text: An android app to explain and demonstrate the concepts of frequency modulation for dsp

title: Raspberry Bot
text: A self-learning robot that uses q-learning, a type of Machine Learning, to follow the line

title: PyBlaster
text: A monophonic synthesizer built with Python that can be played with a Midi keyboard

title: Arc Reactor
text: Using free software like Blender and Cura to model and 3D-print the famous Arc reactor
